channel.title: How to make it so that people can fight anywhere (challenge)
channel.description:
How do I make it so its basicly like the duel arena, but everywhere, lol.
Like Ex:
Trade Blah Follow Blah Fight Blah +Challenge+ Blah < How do I make it like tht. So that people can fun duel everywhere!
Ty.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 19, 2007, 09:45:53 PM[/size][hr]Lol?

item.title: How to make it so that people can fight anywhere (challenge)
item.dc:creator: @D3athtousall D3athtousall
item.description:
@D3athtousall wrote:

Well, I added the option, and I have the info of the duel: when u lose, options of it, ect ect.
(got it off project lol)

But where do I put it? 0.0?

item.title: How to make it so that people can fight anywhere (challenge)
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

before you even attepmt the click option, you might want to attempt:
[+] Code in your own boolean for the death of a duealing player:
[+] A Methed for rules
[+] Staking metheds

and some more things i cant think of the top of my head. try those first, BUT for the boolean for death, try looking at public boolean applydead, and learn how they work.

Read full topic
